wikipedia_page.main: Alexander James Mellor (born 22 July 1991) is an English cricketer who most recently played for Warwickshire. He is a left-handed batsman who also plays as a wicket-keeper.

link_mentions.page: List of Warwickshire County Cricket Club players

response: Alex Mellor (born 1994) is an English professional rugby league footballer who plays as a  forward and  for the Leeds Rhinos in the Betfred Super League.
Alex Mellor was born in Halifax, West Yorkshire, England.
